snippet.title: Retrowave Rider | 2D Synthwave Platformer
snippet.description:
Retrowave Rider is a mash up of Geometry Dash and Guitar Hero. Dive into synthwave worlds filled with retro-inspired visuals and smooth synth sounds, and experience this journey with all of its trials and glories.

Epic Games Store➡️https://bit.ly/Retrowave_Rider_On_EGS
Steam➡️https://bit.ly/Retrowave_Rider_On_Steam

Drive forward onto the neon-lit road.

You will conquer the path before you. Use color-switching powers to reshape the levels to your advantage.

- Hand-crafted level design.
- An unique mix of runner and puzzle that will keep you on your toes.
- Extra collectables that unlock customization options for your rider.
- Accessibility support for colorblindness, and for people with slower reaction times.

➡️ https://www.tiktok.com/@meridian4.games 
➡️ https://discord.com/invite/adMSaZK32K
➡️ https://twitter.com/Meridian4
➡️ https://www.instagram.com/meridian_4/
➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/Meridian4
➡️ https://www.facebook.com/Meridian4

#platformer #geometrydash #retrowave
